main event: A dark, disc-shaped object was sighted in the sky over Cuyahoga Falls, Ohio on August 28, 1965.
interesting points: The object was smaller than a dime and appeared at an elevation of about 75 degrees in the northeast sky.
The object had a pinkish color and moved slowly, veering from the side before disappearing towards the northwest.
The witness reported the object was smaller than the moon and seemed to travel a foreign distance.
A second witness, Anna Duff, also reported seeing the object.
The object was visible for about 3 minutes before disappearing behind trees or buildings.
